version_description:
+ DEFLECT
New game mode!
Score goals by blasting, banking, and curving the ball from one screen to the other.
Requires only one person to have full game unlocked.
+ Fixes a bug that would sometimes require the player to Restore Purchases after updating.

+ MOTYL
New ship enters the battle!
Explore new tactics and abilities with this hexagon shaped ship!
Playable in DUEL, DEFEND, and DEFLECT.

+ Gameplay improvements and optimizations.
+ Updates for iOS 9 and latest devices.

+ Fixed Bluetooth when playing with and between iOS10 devices.
+ Improved WiFi discovery.
+ Minor bug fixes.

1.2.32
+ Updated for newest iOS devices!

1.2.31
+ Fixed Bluetooth when playing with and between iOS10 devices.
+ Improved WiFi discovery.
+ Minor bug fixes.

1.2.33
+ Fixed crash on iOS7 and below.

1.2.31 - 1.2.32
+ Fixed Bluetooth when playing with and between iOS10 devices.
+ Updated for newest iOS devices!
+ Improved WiFi discovery.

1.2.34
+ Fixed crash on iOS7 and below.

1.2.31 - 1.2.32
+ Fixed Bluetooth when playing with and between iOS10 devices.
+ Updated for newest iOS devices!
+ Improved WiFi discovery.

1.3.03
+ Two new ships enter the fray, Kobuz and Komar!
- Komar : Spray your opponent with small homing bullets.
- Kobuz : Charge up and blast a laser beam across your screen.
+ Localized for English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Spanish (Mexico).
+ Improved networking.
+ Visual improvements, lots of bug fixes.

Hope you enjoy the new ships!

Hey friends! New update is finally here. Excited to share a new ship with y'all. Hope you like it!

1.4.01
+ More bug fixes.

1.4.00
+ New ship!
- Meduza : Unleash bullets that shock opponents and ricochet off walls!
+ Fixed the Stats screen.
+ Gameplay tweaks.
+ Full notch support! :)

Hey friends! New update is finally here. Excited to share a new ship with y'all. Hope you like it!

1.3.17
+ New ship!
- Meduza : Unleash bullets that shock opponents and ricochet off walls!
+ Fixed the Stats screen.
+ Gameplay tweaks.
+ Full notch support! :)
+ More bug fixes.

Hey friends! New update is finally here. Excited to share a new ship with y'all. Hope you like it!

Hey everyone!! Another DUAL update is here!

1.5.03
+ Introducing JEZ!
- In DUEL mode JEZ will launch out explosive projectiles.
- You can remotely detonate them by swiping horizontally.
- In DEFLECT mode swiping left or right will give the ball a quick boost in either direction based on how long you charged.
+ New backgrounds during gameplay, one per ship.
+ KOMAR's bullets will now also hone in on enemy bullets.
+ Plenty of gameplay tweaks and bug fixes.

DUAL is made by a one man shop so apologies if updates don't come out as quickly as we all would like. Please reach out with feedback on new modes or ships. Thanks so much all your support!!

- Sebastian
